description.description: The description of the test suite

id.description: The unique ID of the test suite

completed_on.description: The date/time when the test suite was closed (as UNIX timestamp) (added with TestRail 4.0)

name.description: The name of the test suite

project_id.description: The ID of the project this test suite belongs to

is_baseline.description: True if the test suite is a baseline test suite and false otherwise (added with TestRail 4.0)

is_completed.description: True if the test suite is marked as completed/archived and false otherwise (added with TestRail 4.0)

is_master.description: True if the test suite is a master test suite and false otherwise (added with TestRail 4.0)

url.description: The address/URL of the test suite in the user interface
